com.erikartymiuk.badbudgetlogic.main

Class MoneyOwed

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.erikartymiuk.badbudgetlogic.main.MoneyOwed
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CreditCard, Loan

    public class MoneyOwed
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing various types of money owed (credit cards, loans, other) Credit card and loan objects should be part of the corresponding subclasses. All other moneyOwed objects (classified as other or misc. to the user) should be using this class directly

    • Constructor Detail

      • MoneyOwed

        public MoneyOwed(java.lang.String name,
                 double debtAmount,
                 boolean quicklook,
                 double interestRate)
          throws BadBudgetInvalidValueException
        Money Owed constructor. Sets up a debt with no payments
        Parameters:
        name - - name or description of the debt, cannot be null or empty
        debtAmount - - debt amount, cannot be negative
        quicklook - - indicates if this debt should be considered for quicklook
        interestRate - - the interest rate of this debt. default is to compound daily the balance of the debt at this rate/365.25. 0 indicates no interest rate should be considered and a negative value is invalid.
        Throws:
        BadBudgetInvalidValueException

    • Method Detail

      • verifyValues

        public static int verifyValues(java.lang.String name,
                               double debtAmount,
                               double interestRate)
        Verifies the values for a potential debt (money owed) and returns an error code as an integer if an error is found. Returns 0 if no error is found. Possible error codes: 0 - Values are good 1 - Name is null or is empty 2 - Debt Amount is negative 3 - Interest Rate is negative
        Parameters:
        name - - the name to check cannot be null or empty
        debtAmount - - the debt amount, must be greater or equal to 0
        interestRate - - the interest rate, must be greater or equal to 0
        Returns:
        - an int indicating the error found or 0 if no error found

      • addPredictData

        public void addPredictData(PredictDataMoneyOwed row)
        Adds the given row to this debt objects predict data list (at the end)
        Parameters:
        row - - the predictData to add to the end of this objects list

      • setPredictData

        public void setPredictData(int index,
                           PredictDataMoneyOwed row)
        Add the passed row at index to this money owed object predict data list.
        Parameters:
        index - - the location to add the given row
        row - - the row to add

      • getPredictData

        public PredictDataMoneyOwed getPredictData(int dayIndex)
        Returns the PredictData at dayIndex for this debt
        Parameters:
        dayIndex - - the date as an index off the starting date in the prediction algorithm
        Returns:
        the predict data row at the given index (corresponds to the data on a specific date for this debt account)

      • setupPayment

        public void setupPayment(Payment p)
                  throws BadBudgetInvalidValueException
        Schedule a payment. Replaces any old payment that was set previously. Ensures that the payment being setup, if not null, is attached to this debt
        Parameters:
        p - - the payment to schedule or null to remove any existing payment
        Throws:
        BadBudgetInvalidValueException - - thrown if the payment wasn't meant for this debt

      • removePayment

        public void removePayment()
        Remove any payment that may be set for this money owed account. If no payment is set then this method does nothing.

        public void setQuicklook(boolean quicklook)
        Updates the quicklook value of these money owed object (a simple setter)
        Parameters:
        quicklook - - the new quicklook value

      • clearPredictData

        public void clearPredictData()
        Empties (or Resets) this moneyoweds predict data list.

      • quicklook

        public boolean quicklook()
        Getter for quicklook field
        Returns:
        true if this debt should be considered for quicklook

      • interestRate

        public double interestRate()

      • setInterestRate

        public void setInterestRate(double interestRate)

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Date predictEndDate,
                   int dayIndex)
        After running the prediction algorithm this method updates this debt's values to the value's it would have on the day represented by day index. If a goal is set it is assumed to still be valid (override this method if that might not be true i.e creditCards).
        Parameters:
        predictEndDate - - the date our prediction algorithm ends. Any interest calculations treat this + 1 day as the start date.
        dayIndex - - the day, as an offset from the start date used in the prediction algorithm, to update this debts values to.

      • updateNextDatesOnly

        public void updateNextDatesOnly(int dayIndex)
        Updates this debts next dates only. This applies only if the debt has a payment associated with it. If the payment has a goal date it is cleared
        Parameters:
        dayIndex - - the day to update this debt to
